item.title: To create stacked and grouped bar charts
item.description: I want to create stacked bar charts (duh, this is the best kind), but I also want them grouped. This proved more difficult than I first expected. Example code as follows:

item.title: Adding a subtitle in plotly
item.description: In plotly, there used to be no way to add a subtitle explicitly. Now you can add a subtitle as part of the title dictionary. For example:
